Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include the #97 Skokie bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
